评论概述: Zippers were broken! What I received was crap compared to previous purchases!
评论详情: I do not know what happened but this was not Helle Hansen quality! It’s like someone shipped construction to China! I’m going to have to closely scrutinize what I order in the future!
Heavy duty jacket, does take a bit of time to break in but will definitely hold up well and is one of my favorite work jackets.

评论概述: I Want to Keep It, But...
评论详情: I bought the 3XL jacket for an upcoming ski trip to Wyoming.  I didn't pay attention to it being a HHworkwear jacket.  You could wear it for skiing, but it much stiffer than most ski jackets.  I really want to keep this jacket, but I'll have to return it.  I'm 5'8", 280 lbs, 40 waist, 54" chest, 20" neck, 34/35 shirt sleeve length.  I carry my weight in the stomach.  I wear 3XL T-shirts.  I went to Skier's Outlet and tried a bunch of jackets on.  I squeezed into a 2XL Spyder ski jacket and purchased.  This HH jacket looks great.  I'd definitely wear it as an everyday jacket.  It feels super durable.  It would take some effort to rip the outer shell.  It feels like a weather proof canvas bag or firehose.  It has a little stiffness to it.  I got warm pretty quick in the house trying it on.  The hood has to go though.  It is rolled into a collar pocket and creates an uncomfortable/annoying stiff collar.  Most of the jacket was a bit loose.  The sleeves were too long for me.  It has Velcro at the wrists for tightening.  The back of the jacket went below the belt line by a few inches.  The front of the jacket was just below my belly button.  Not sure why a 3XL wouldn't compensate for the reason a person wears a 3XL.  It has a cord around the bottom for tightening it around the waist.  If had fit over the belly, I might have still returned it to get a 2XL.

I bought this as an early Christmas present for my son. He prefers coats that have a lot of pockets and not flashy. This coat was perfect and he like the fit when he stretches, it not binding. Overall good price for a great quality winter coat. One last thing. It can be worn casually but it’s “plain” enough to be worn if you needed to dress less casual too.

I actually bought for my gf. She wanted a good winter jacket. I know these are tough so don’t have to worry about wearing it doing whatever. The sleeves are insulated like most coats aren’t. She says it’s warm. Sometimes too warm for Pennsylvania weather but That’s fine
The back was cut longer and that’s great but the front was cut shorter and could be a little bit longer

I haven’t been able to wear it yet but it seems to be great quality and fits well.
This is a well made and warm jacket that also is lightweight. It is not cheaply made at all. There are plenty of pockets and it is wind resistant and seems to deal well with moisture.

Jacket fits pretty nice and snug, room for a hoodie underneath. Arm length is a little long but the wrists can be tightened with velcro.  It’s not particularly well insulated, good for 40F at the lowest IMO. Was 34F this morning and I’m wearing long Johns, long sleeve shirt, hoodie, and the new jacket and I was cold. I think the waterproof shell is too breathable, but it seems like a strong material which I need, as a mechanic.  The hood is removable or can be stuffed into the collar.  My 6’4” 140lb buddy fits in it pretty well too

I purchased this jacket as I have enjoyed the other Helly Hansen jackets I've purchased.  I wanted something that was waterproof AND insulated as well.  This fit the bill perfectly.  It IS warm and is waterproof.  Like all HH products it appears well made and uses high quality materials.  It fits perfectly and allows for very good arm movement without feeling tight or constrained.  I was a bit dubious about the fit as other HH products can sometimes run a bit smallish.  This one fit perfectly.  You can adjust the cuffs and the "waist" band to keep cold air out.  The hood stores nicely in the jacket collar.

Bought a few of these for company jackets (HVAC company ) employees look good and these jackets are pretty durable  and warm. Customers have made numerous complaints on these and have asked “Where’s my jacket ?” At various times throughout the winter. I will be buying more come next fall.
Held up to my expectations

I only wore this jacket for a week and was lifting a box over my head and the seam in the arm pit area split. For a jacket this expensive I'm not pleased with the stich strength.  One day late on being able to return for a replacement.

评论概述: Huge Reflective stripe across the back of shoulders!
评论详情: Overall it's a decent jacket.  I would not consider this a heavy winter jacket without layering however.  Husband returned this because although the description says "reflective" elements, no where does it say in this listing or any other website there is a Huge Reflective stripe across the back shoulders.  Now I imagine if you need this as a safety feature at work it's great, however he had intended to wear this as a normal winter coat and that reflective stripe looks rediculous unless you are a police officer, fireman, airport ramp worker etc. Sad this feature was a deal breaker, nice jacket otherwise.  I took a couple stars off because when I read insulated jacket I expect this to really be a warm coat, at least as insulated and warm as my own Helly Hansen.  We live in Wisconsin and this isn't "insulated" like I would expect, period.

My husband loves it.  Nice weight to it.  He worked outside in Alaska and the warmth was nice enough but didn't make him feel heavy or sweaty.  Fit as expected.  He normally wears a 2x-3x and we ordered a 3x so he could layer up if he wanted.  It fits perfectly, has room for layers, but fits nicely without the layers.  Particularly like that it hits around the hips in the front but dips lower in the back to keep the elements from going down your pants when you bend over. For some reason I was thinking it had a regular hood, but it looks like it has one folded into the collar.  I ordered it without him looking at it but I guess he prefers the hood inside the collar.Overall a perfect coat for his needs, which I am glad because it was not Prime, so it would've been a hassle to return.  I would buy this coat again in a heartbeat.

Comprada por la foto con dudas, una vez puesta …cómoda , caliente, cuatro bolsillos exteriores con cremallera y uno interior con velcro , capucha desmontable con cremallera, por si te molesta con ella recogida en el cuello , yo la quito , la pongo en uno de los múltiples bolsillos y si me hace falta que vaya a llover mucho, se monta en segundos, mido 1.80 y 74..75 kg , pedí la M dado que HH talla un pelín grande , pedir una menos a la habitual en otras marcas , yo siempre lo hago y van 4 que adquirí de esta marca y modelos diferentes , y siempre pido una talla menos y me va perfecto, si la pones sin sudaderas o jersey queda  un pelín floja ..apenas , y con sudaderas queda perfectamente, te da movilidad bastante tanto de una manera como otra, aguanta la lluvia y la capucha aunque es grande trae para regular el tamaño de como de grande quiero que sea..conclusión buena chaqueta para otoño invierno, se ve fuerte y muy bien acabada, por mi parte ..TOTALMENTE RECOMENDABLE, comprada para el trabajo y fue muy acertada la compraPosdata…para los que veáis en la etiqueta fabricada en china…ya hace tiempo que las marcas como HH , Ck, Nike etc… fabrican en países como china o Bangladés etc…para muestra APPLE fabrican en china , esto es la globalización, la diferencia es que las marcas caras exigen estándares de calidad  al pasar sus pedidos a estos países…que ya ensamblan como Europa O América o incluso a veces mejor, espero que os valga de referencia mi opinión

HH è una marca molto conosciuta, specialmente nei paesi nordici, per produrre abbigliamento da lavoro e vita all'aperto di eccellente qualità. In particolare la giacca Berg è una giacca da freddo, apparentemente leggera, ma composta da tessuti resistenti all'usura e alle basse temperature. Io l'ho presa per escursioni e lavoro in autunno/inverno ed è un prodotto valido. Ha quattro tasche frontali tutte con cerniera e una tasca interna senza chiusura. Ha elementi riflettenti, anche sulla schiena e, particolare interessante, la spalla è cucita in un unico pezzo per evitare strappi. Interessante la cerniera posta internamente nella parte posteriore che permette una ispezione della fodera e per areare il giaccone in caso di pioggia o neve. Ha un cappuccio regolabile che si nasconde nel colletto ma che si può anche asportare. Il colletto, con chiusura alta e avvolgente, è foderato di pile. Altro particolare, il lato posteriore del giaccone è leggermente più lungo per proteggere anche quando si sta in posizione abbassata sulle gambe o ci si inchina in avanti, mentre il lato frontale arriva poco più giù della vita. La seconda spedizione è stata perfetta e il giaccone HH è stato consegnato ben protetto, con etichette applicate e protezioni di carta. Molto consigliato.

Chaqueta caliente, pero no para temperaturas extremas. Mido 1,76 peso 90kg talla L me vale con forro polar debajo. Si quieres ponerte ropa más gruesa, como sudaderas..... Yo te recomendaría una talla más.

Una chaqueta muy justita, si no fuera por que tiene una cremallera que al abrirla puedes ver y palpar el relleno, no se podría opinar, pero es una guata como las de las batas que usaba mi abuela hace 50 años, y encima de baja densidad. Cuando la pruebe con frío y lluvia real, opinaré al respecto pero la primera impresión es muy justita

La compré para navegar en vela. Soy de latam, así que no llevo muy bien el frío del invierno navegando en el Mediterraneo. La chaqueta es lo que promete, te aísla del viento y la humedad muy bien. No calienta pero eso no es lío cuando navegas bajo el sol y cuando hace frío, un saco debajo y vas muy bien.  Lamentablemente, en la primera lavada para desalarla, usando lavadora y siguiendo las instrucciones que traía, ya se saltaron un montón impresionante de hilos de las costuras principales. Para alguien que lleva trabajando 3 años en el sector petrolero fue decepcionante para ropa que se supone que es para condiciones de trabajo. Ni a los cargos baratos de dotación se les saltan así los hilos de las costuras principales.

Premetto lo comprato per lavorare, mi muovo molto bene, tasche, 4 frontali e una interna, non è molto denso come giacca, comunque, sotto la giacca ho una maglietta termica,polo e pile, e oggi che era -1 e tirava vento freddo, ero abbastanza bene, in alternativa, provate la Carhartt... Oppure helly Hansen Workwear Evolution,
Estoy encantado con la compra.
Abriga bien. Bien con viento y también con lluvia.
Bello, comodo e caldo. Consegna nei tempi. Molto soddisfatto
Forse solo un po' costoso
Giacca che straconsiglio.leggera calda impermeabile...merita i soldi che costa..spedizione velocissima imballo terrificante.. una busta di carta..cinque stelle la giacca le merita.

Ho acquistato la giacca perché la Helly Hansen per me è sempre stata una garanzia di prodotti di qualità, ho sempre utilizzato questa marca per la vela anche negli anni passati ma con molto dispiacere devo dire di essere un pochino deluso. a mio parere andrebbero riviste con molta attenzione le misure delle taglie, perché questa ho ordinato aveva piu di qualche problema di vestibilità.
Se ve de buena calidad y se ve calientita para el frío, se ve (No la he probado) resistente a la nieve y lluvia ligera. Es muy corta de la cintura, me llega al cinturón del pantalón.

The thread on the locker loop's right side disintegrated as soon as I hang the jacket and the jacket fell on the floor. Ok, I took a needle, a strong thread and fixed it. Went to hang it again, it fell again. What happened this time? Now the locker loop's left side failed. Seriously? Is there quality control at all in the factory? Ok, fixed left side too, it's not falling any more. Hopefully not all needlework is this bad on this jacket otherwise it will fall apart before the winter and before I have a chance to wear it.  It's not just a problem with this jacket, many things bought on Amazon lately have similar problems. I bought a cargo shorts just before the summer and I already had to mend them 3 times. The thread broke in all cases. Similar problem with a pillow I bought, thread broke the first day. I don't know why companies try to save a cent or two by using a thread which disintegrates if you look at it the wrong way (no force needs to be applied). When I pick a thread, and this is mostly when I have to fix stuff I bought on Amazon, I always pull the thread apart with my fingers and pick one which looks like it would cut my finger off before breaking. That's what clothes making companies should do in adition to using some kind of quality control.
Hally Hansen un nome una garanzia
Muy buena calidad-precio. Acabados geniales. Abriga y es impermeable. La recomiendo.
Isolante, traspirante, robusta, ben fatta. Al di sopra delle aspettative.

Even though they're supposed to be 'workwear', they're smart enough to use for any occasion.  I'll probably buy a couple more to stash away at the back of the wardrobe, so I can replace the ones I've got when they start getting tatty. The older one is 3 years old and still looks fine though.

I have found it keeps me kept warm and dry i would recommend this coat for any one who works out doors in inclement weather. well made comfortable to work in and made with durable materials.

Die Watte-Fütterung ist allerdings Mist (beim Waschen könnte es "spannend" werden > Klumpen). Fleece wäre besser gewesen. Dafür 2 Sterne Abzug. Sonst vernünftig konzipiert, insbes. hochschließend. Winddicht (zum Motorradfahren geeignet) + wasserfest. Preis absolut ok.

This is my second HH Berg jacket.  I bought one in red a couple of years back, and it served me very well indeed.  The only reason I retired it, is because I always wanted a black one - and this one came along at the right price.  The jacket is extremely warm - plenty warm enough for a UK winter.  It's also not "thin" and not easily ripped like a lot of more expensive "designer" coats (you know which one's I mean!).  I wear this in heavily wooded areas when I'm out walking with my dogs, and I know this won't snag (my last one never did) on every protruding branch.  Glad I got it at the amazing price I paid!
Great work Jacket light weight and very comfortable.
